content: GX 2 Gas-actuated fastening tool Short-stroke gas nailer for drywall track ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Direct fastening tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features Short (20 mm), comfortable stroke and low recoil reduces fatigue, especially in overhead applications Cordless tool platform – the same battery for all 12V Hilti tools Excellent battery reach – 8,000 nails per charge, with a charging time of just 30 minutes Drives up to 1,100 nails with one GC 52 gas can Wide range of nails for fastening to a wide variety of materials Applications Fastening drywall track to floors, walls and ceilings on concrete, solid masonry or steel Fastening mesh, membranes or foil with special washer holders to concrete walls Fastening wall tie connections to concrete, solid masonry or steel – use of the special washer holder is recommended Suitable for various light-duty fastening applications on concrete, solid masonry or steel ### TECHNICAL DATA: Tool body weight: 8.2 lb. Fastener length range: 0.55 - 1.54 in Power source type: GC 52 Gas can Technical Data | Tool body weight | 8.2 lb | Fastener Intake | Collated | Fastener length range | 0.55 - 1.54 in | Power source type | GC 52 Gas can | Hilti Connect | Yes | Power (max.) | 80 J ### ITEMS- 3538125 -
